Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Reduces the number of members of the board of trustees of the Mamaroneck public library district
Summary: Changes the number of members of the board of trustees of the Mamaroneck public library district from eleven to no less than five and no more than fifteen.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 658 of the laws of 1991 establishing a library district in the village of Mamaroneck, Westchester county, in relation to the number of members of the board of trustees
